text: Hello everyone! Does anyone know if there’s a way of restricting the modules to be used in a page. Let’s say I build a custom landing page with several modules, but I want just to give access to some in there. Is there a way of doing this?

I’m losing my mind - does anyone know where that module is being pulled from? Working with memberships for the first time and I’m really having trouble piecing things together. How do I go about changing this form? What does ‘member_login’ represent? <https://jmp.sh/U4zcQws>
